list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Update .gitignore to simplify rules and track deps.txt
Consolidated IDE-related files into a single /.idea/ rule for clarity. Added deps.txt to the ignore list to exclude dependency tracking files.

task.summary:
Update .gitignore to simplify rules and track deps.txt
Consolidated IDE-related files into a single /.idea/ rule for clarity. Added deps.txt to the ignore list to exclude dependency tracking files.

MESSAGE.value:
Remove outdated .idea configuration files and update references.
Deleted unnecessary .idea files to clean up project settings. Updated `tox.ini` and `README.md` references to reflect the updated lowercase project naming convention (`budgetsync`). These changes ensure consistency and remove obsolete files from version control.

Add error handling and logging improvements
Introduced custom exceptions (`CSVError`, `DatabaseError`, and `TransactionProcessingError`) and applied a `@log_exceptions` decorator to log errors in key methods. Enhanced CSV and database handling with improved logging, code refactoring, and better handling of edge cases such as missing files or invalid data. Added unittests to verify logging for skipped rows.

Introduce logging, error handling, and refactor CSV operations.
Added detailed logging and exception handling across CSV and DB operations to enhance robustness and debugging capability. Refactored methods for better readability and modularity, such as separating row mapping logic. Implemented decorators to centralize error logging and introduced custom exceptions for improved error specificity.

Refactor path handling to use absolute paths consistently.
Converted all file and directory path operations to use `os.path.abspath` across the codebase for consistency and to avoid relative path issues. Updated affected modules, tests, and supporting classes to reflect this change.

Add detailed module-level docstrings for better clarity
Each module now includes an explanation of its purpose, classes, and key functionality. This enhances maintainability and helps developers quickly understand the codebase. Minor improvements were also made to existing comments for added precision.

Add module-level documentation and remove unused Py inspection
Added detailed docstrings summarizing functionality, usage, and key components for all modules. Removed the unused `PyCompatibilityInspection` from the `qodana.yaml` configuration for a cleaner static analysis setup.

Update .gitignore to simplify rules and track deps.txt
Consolidated IDE-related files into a single /.idea/ rule for clarity. Added deps.txt to the ignore list to exclude dependency tracking files.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value:
Update .gitignore to simplify rules and track deps.txt
Consolidated IDE-related files into a single /.idea/ rule for clarity. Added deps.txt to the ignore list to exclude dependency tracking files.
